record.id: field.name="alternate.contact" and file.name="incidents" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: alternate.contact
record.file.name: incidents

brief.brief: The name of the person who initiated the Interaction.

detail.detail: Click Fill to select the initiator's name from the list of contact names or create a new contact record.
If the issue was reported by someone other than the contact, select Reported By different from Contact Name to enter information about that person.
Service Manager displays the fields Reported By, Phone, Fax, and Ext. when you select the option "Reported by different from Contact Name?".
